item.title: Resources
item.description: Here’s a collection of resources that I consider some of the best in each subject. These are not Bourbaki -style; instead, they aim to motivate concepts through examples and intuition while maintaining rigor. Mathematics Logic and Proofs Book of Proof — Richard Hammack (PDF) Single Variable Calculus Calculus — Michael Spivak Multivariable Calculus Analysis on Manifolds — James Munkres Analysis Understanding Analysis — Stephen Abbott Linear Algebra Linear Algebra Done Right — Sheldon Axler Complex Analysis Complex Analysis — Elias M.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Mahmudul Hasan Turjoy, I am a maths major at BRAC University. I have interest in maths. Currently, I am studying complex analysis, differential equations, numerical analysis, algebraic topology and algebraic-flavoured elementary number theory. Right now, my fave mathematicians are: Galois, Gauss, Cauchy, Fourier. Contact Me I’d love to connect with mentors, join a reading group, or just chat with people who enjoy learning and exploring pure maths. Please feel free to contact me.
